gov.nasa.worldwind.render
Interface Highlightable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Balloon, GlobeBalloon, ScreenBalloon, SurfaceShape
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAnnotationBalloon, AbstractBalloon, AbstractBrowserBalloon, AbstractGeneralShape, AbstractShape, AbstractSurfaceShape, Box, ColladaNodeShape, ColladaSceneShape, Cone, Cylinder, DirectedPath, Ellipsoid, ExtrudedPolygon, GlobeAnnotationBalloon, GlobeBrowserBalloon, KMLAbstractBalloon, KMLExtrudedPolygonImpl, KMLGlobeBalloonImpl, KMLGroundOverlayPolygonImpl, KMLLineStringPlacemarkImpl, KMLPointPlacemarkImpl, KMLPolygonImpl, KMLScreenBalloonImpl, KMLSurfacePolygonImpl, Path, PointGrid, PointPlacemark, Polygon, Pyramid, RecordSurfaceShape, RigidShape, ScreenAnnotationBalloon, ScreenBrowserBalloon, SectorSelector.RegionShape, SurfaceCircle, SurfaceEllipse, SurfacePolygon, SurfacePolygons, SurfacePolyline, SurfacePolylines, SurfaceQuad, SurfaceSector, SurfaceSquare, Wedge
public interface Highlightable

An interface to control a shape's highlighting. Shapes implementing this interface have their own highlighting behaviors and attributes and the means for setting them.

Method Summary
 boolean isHighlighted()
          Indicates whether to highlight the shape.
 void setHighlighted(boolean highlighted)
          Specifies whether to highlight the shape.
 

Method Detail

isHighlighted

boolean isHighlighted()
Indicates whether to highlight the shape.

Returns:
true to highlight the shape, otherwise false.

setHighlighted

void setHighlighted(boolean highlighted)
Specifies whether to highlight the shape.

Parameters:
highlighted - true to highlight the shape, otherwise false.
